name: CabOnline
description: This is a taxi system mainly operated in Sweden, Norway, and Finland. In Taxi Cabonline people can book a trip with some interesting features like adding car-options, pre-booking, add via-points, and more. Moreover, it has common features like rating and location tracking.
responsibilities: Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.
Collaborating with the design team to define app features
Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.
Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.
Fixing application bugs before the final release.
Publishing application on App Store.
Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.
Designing and implementing application updates

name: Harvest
description: This is a simple informative app where user can get to know about informations about all fruits and vegetables.

name: Fitopia
description: This is a consumer facing iOS mobile application for a Health care business in London. The app facilitates the user to view and book the classes by date. Users can able to make the payments through the app. Additionally the app provides some facilities such as Google maps, push notifications etc.
responsibilities: Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.
